title: Capitol Reef National Park: Night Sky
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Natural Features & Ecosystems     Night Sky                 Night Sky       The night sky is everyone's heritage; however, natural darkness is becoming rare. Capitol Reef National Park has some of the best night sky viewing opportunities of the western national parks. For more information, visit the National Park Service's Natural Sounds and Night Skies Division.             Night Sky Tour   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:13 seconds  Summer evening programs at Capitol Reef may include Night Sky Tours presented by visiting astronomers, who share their knowledge and appreciation of the night with others. These presenters also encourage park visitors to protect the night sky by reducing ambient light.                Nightfall   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:44 seconds  Open skies and desert landforms provide a perfect combination for watching night descend on Capitol Reef. This video series was taken by one of many Night Sky Ambassadors who volunteer through the National Park Service's Natural Sounds and Night Skies Division.                       Night Sky   9 Photos  Night Sky
